page.title: 13Haddenham Shops Described
page.content: There are{24 shops}in Haddenham.{12 of {them are food shops}and the others are Florist, Chemist, Hairdresser, Electrical/TV, Hardware, Craft, Carpets, Betting, Drapers, Newsagent, Post Office and Off Licence. Some of the shops are in very old buildings which give them a lot of character. The{Beehive}in Churchway used to be a public house before 1834 and was then converted into a shop. It housed the{Post Office}for a while, but this is now further up Churchway. The Bakery has been used for the same purpose for 200 years. There has been a butchers in Station Road for the same period. Over the last 50 years many shops have changed their function and older villagers remember shops no longer in existance. Haddenham is fortunate to have retained so many shops that offer a friendly service.
